hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Ruto's Letter# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #hearts#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Heart Container#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Granny's Potion Shop#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #5# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
